pullrequest.title: changed the calculation of force/torque on parent link for gazebo::physics::ODEJoint::GetForceTorque()

content.raw: Thanks for the advice @traversaro , I will have a look at how to implement these tests, but this looks to me as if it will be quite an amount of effort to take, so I'm going to need a bit of time for that.
content.html: Thanks for the advice @traversaro , I will have a look at how to implement these tests, but this looks to me as if it will be quite an amount of effort to take, so I'm going to need a bit of time for that.
